.. _sphx_glr_documentation_auto_examples_ann:

============================================
Example: Approximate nearest neighbor search
============================================

This example shows how to perform approximate nearest neighbor search.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="In this example we will retrieve similar words from GLOVE embeddings with an ANNG graph.">
